description: Spicy rostis with plenty of crunch.
name: Sweet Potato Rosti Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 400g sweet potato, peeled, grated and drained
1 medium red onion, peeled and sliced
1 medium white onion, peeled and sliced

recipeInstructions.text: Peel and grate the sweet potato. Combine in a bowl with the rest of the ingredients.
Heat up a suitable pan for shallow frying to a high heat but not bubbling.
Now divide your potato mixture into 4 patties and pack together tightly. Shallow fry the rostis for 4 minutes on each side.
Place on a plate with some kitchen roll to drain the excess liquid before serving.
